Vals.net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VA: <StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%joinarefileslocal Are Files Local Network 'true' if files were downloaded via local network, false otherwise</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1>%joincomm Command at the right of =:=, if there's only 1 =:= </_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2>%joincomm() Commands at the right of =:=, if there's more than 1 =:= </_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES3>%joindeviceapilevel Api Level OS version the devices is running</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES3><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES4>%joindevicecanreceivenotifications Can receive notifications Indication if the device can receive notifications</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES4><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES5>%joindevicecansendlocation Can send location Indication if the device can report its location</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES5><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES6>%joindevicecansendsms Can send SMS Indication if the device can send SMS messages</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES6><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES7>%joindeviceid Device Id Id for the device</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES7><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES8>%joindevicelocalnetwork Local Network 'true' if device is on local network, 'false' otherwise</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES8><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES9>%joindevicemodel Device Model Model of the device</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES9><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES10>%joindevicename Device Name Name the device</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES10><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES11>%joindeviceregid Push Id Push registration id for the device</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES11><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES12>%joindevicetype Device Type Type the device</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES12><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES13>%joindevicetypecode Device Type Code Code representing the type the device</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES13><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES14>%joindeviceuseraccount User Account Owner account of the device</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES14><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES15>%joinfiles() Files Files received in the push</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES15><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES16>%joinmessage The whole message that was received </_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES16><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES17>%joinpar() Parameters at the left of =:= </_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES17><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES18>%joinsendername Sender Name Name of the device that sent the push</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES18><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES19>%joinstartedcapture Started Capture <b>true</b> if capture started <b>false</b> if not</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES19><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES20>%joinstoppedcapture Stopped Capture <b>true</b> if capture stopped <b>false</b> if not</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES20><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES21>%jointext Text Text received in the push</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES21><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES22>%jointitle Title Title received in the push</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES22><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES23>%joinurl URL URL received in the push</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES23></StringArray>

Share.d:
List My PC Music/Files

Interaction between EventGhost & HTTP Server, AutoRemote, Join. The ideal method is the HTTP Server; no limits to the data set.

Reddit post

EventGhost XML - GD

u/The_IMPERIAL_One

Action.label: Set any no. of directories per line without quotes
Contains the details of Listed Files. Not possible to delete if EventGhost is running.

HTTP Server



Just send a message serverlist_mymusic=:=%server_address=:=%output_file=:=ALL_DIRECTORIES_SEPARATED_BY_=:=

%server_address = http://LOCAL_IP:PORT/PATH_TO_RESPONSE

No need for html pages

Vals.net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VA: <StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%joinmessage Result Message If there's no error, a possible status message</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1>%err Error Code Only available if you select <b>Continue Task After Error</b> and the action ends in error</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2>%errmsg Error Message Only available if you select <b>Continue Task After Error</b> and the action ends in error</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2></StringArray>

Vals.net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VA: <StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%http_cookies Cookies The cookies the server sent in the response in the Cookie:COOKIE_VALUE format. You can use this directly in the 'Headers' field of the HTTP Request action</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1>%http_data Data Data that the server responded from the HTTP request.</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2>%http_file_output File Output Will always contain the file's full path even if you specified a directory as the File to save.</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES3>%http_response_code Response Code The HTTP Code the server responded</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES3><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES4>%http_headers() Response Headers The HTTP Headers the server sent in the response. Each header is in the 'key:value' format</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES4><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES5>%http_response_length Response Length The size of the response in bytes</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES5></StringArray>

Action.label: Selected File Absolute Path without Quotes
Arrangement of File Data
Set any no. of directories per line without quotes
Contains the details of Listed Files. Not possible to delete if EventGhost is running.

AutoRemote


Just send a message arlist_mymusic=:=%output_file=:=%directories
Note: No Action Present, You have to create.
Set any no. of directories per line without quotes
Contains the details of Listed Files. Not possible to delete if EventGhost is running.

Join


Just send a message joinlist_mymusic=:=%output_file=:=%directories
